So the original toys had metal and all the good big ones didn't come 
apart.  My prayers were answered long before I discovered 
"Transformers".  I'm not even going to type the words following that.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> because they are easier to sell to the wuss generation as toys if 
they contain no metal parts or in anyway resemble warrior robots that 
blast the scrap out of each other.
> 
> In this day and age it's politically incorrect... ;)
> 
> /me misses the g1 transformers and the toys not these plastic tickle 
me cheetors... :)
> 
> hehehe
>   why would transformers morph?)
